levels.description: ASPD <@ba.vup>+{attack_speed}</>; Each attack reduces the Movement Speed of the target by <@ba.vup>-{-move_speed:0%}</>, with a <@ba.vup>{prob:0%}</> chance to <$ba.root>Bind</> it for <@ba.vup>{debuff}</> seconds
